name: KLOC
description:
KLOC

Keys are required to unlock stuff. What is locked?
No one knows (⊙_⊙;)

Controls:

- Click and drag keys
- R: Restart
- Esc: Pause

Gameplay:

All levels are the same, the difference is just the number of locks

Important note:

When all the locks are unlocked, the game doesn't show any menu or restart. Nothing happen. Either Press "R" to restart or "Escape" to go to the main menu.

Resources:

- BGM Game
- BGM Menu
- Pixel Art by Kenny
